commentaries.text: Today's referee, Daniele Doveri, has blown to start the match.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sampdoria Genoa needs to be cautious. Torino FC have an attacking throw-in.
Torino FC have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Sampdoria Genoa.
Throw-in for Torino FC in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Torino FC's Andrea Belotti is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Free kick Sampdoria Genoa.
Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa.
Throw-in for Sampdoria Genoa at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Free kick for Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Sampdoria Genoa are whistled for offside.
Daniele Doveri awards Sampdoria Genoa a goal kick.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Torino FC.
Throw-in for Torino FC at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Free kick for Torino FC in their own half.
Goal! Torino FC have got their heads in front thanks to a Andrea Belotti strike.
Wilfried Stephane Singo with an assist there.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Torino FC in their own half.
Daniele Doveri awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sampdoria Genoa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino FC's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tomas Rincon for Torino FC who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Tomas Rincon is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Torino FC in the half of Sampdoria Genoa.
Throw-in for Torino FC in the half of Sampdoria Genoa.
Torino FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Turin Torino FC's Wilfried Stephane Singo is caught offside.
Free kick for Sampdoria Genoa in the half of Torino FC.
Torino FC have a goal kick.
In Turin Sampdoria Genoa attack through Fabio Quagliarella. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Torino FC at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Ball safe as Torino FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sampdoria Genoa have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Sampdoria Genoa are coming forward and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Torino FC goal kick.
Sampdoria Genoa's Antonio Candreva misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Torino FC at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Sampdoria Genoa drive forward but Fabio Quagliarella is judged offside.
Free kick for Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Torino FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria Genoa in Turin.
Sampdoria Genoa are pushing forward but Antonio Candreva's finish is wide of the goal.
Torino FC have a goal kick.
Claudio Ranieri (Sampdoria Genoa) is making a first substitution, with Adrien Silva replacing Albin Ekdal.
The away team replace Valerio Verre with Manolo Gabbiadini.
Sampdoria Genoa make their third substitution with Lorenzo Tonelli replacing Maya Yoshida.
Mikkel Damsgaard is on a sub for Jakub Jankto for Sampdoria Genoa.
Daniele Doveri blows against Sampdoria Genoa's Fabio Quagliarella for offside.
Daniele Doveri signals a Torino FC throw-in in Sampdoria Genoa's half.
Daniele Doveri signals a throw-in for Torino FC, close to Sampdoria Genoa's area.
Throw-in for Torino FC close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sampdoria Genoa to take a throw-in in Torino FC territory.
Can Sampdoria Genoa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino FC's half?
Free kick for Torino FC in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa.
Goal! Antonio Candreva levels the match at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Fabio Quagliarella.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Torino FC in their own half.
Andrea Belotti of Torino FC is pulled up for offside.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Torino FC in their own half.
Torino FC are in shooting range from this free kick.
Lorenzo Tonelli (Sampdoria Genoa) has received a yellow card from Daniele Doveri.
Torino FC's Ricardo Rodriguez gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Torino FC have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Free kick Sampdoria Genoa.
Lyanco is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Goal! Fabio Quagliarella gives Sampdoria Genoa a 1-2 lead in Turin.
Great play from Antonio Candreva to set up the goal.
In Turin Torino FC drive forward through Simone Zaza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Torino FC.
Torino FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sampdoria Genoa.
Andrea Belotti is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Andrea Belotti for Torino FC is back on the field again.
Sampdoria Genoa have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Torino FC.
Nicola Murru is replacing Cristian Ansaldi for the home team.
The home team replace Ricardo Rodriguez with Simone Verdi.
Free kick for Sampdoria Genoa in the half of Torino FC.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Sampdoria Genoa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sampdoria Genoa in the half of Torino FC.
Daniele Doveri awards Sampdoria Genoa a goal kick.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Torino FC.
Soualiho Meite for Torino FC drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Torino FC.
Soualiho Meite equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Simone Verdi.
Free kick for Torino FC in their own half.
Simone Verdi of Torino FC gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria Genoa goal kick.
Corner awarded to Torino FC.
Simone Verdi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Torino FC.
Torino FC pushes forward through Lyanco, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sampdoria Genoa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mikkel Damsgaard of Sampdoria Genoa gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Gaston Ramirez is replacing Fabio Quagliarella for the away team.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Torino FC just outside Sampdoria Genoa's area.
Alex Ferrari (Sampdoria Genoa) gets a yellow card.
Torino FC have been awarded a corner by Daniele Doveri.
Free kick for Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Free kick Torino FC.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino FC in Turin.
Daniele Doveri signals a free kick to Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Manolo Gabbiadini of Sampdoria Genoa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria Genoa goal kick.
Daniele Doveri awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sampdoria Genoa in their own half.
Can Torino FC capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Torino FC are coming forward and Simone Zaza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Daniele Doveri awards Sampdoria Genoa a goal kick.
Daniele Doveri signals a Torino FC throw-in in Sampdoria Genoa's half.
Free kick for Torino FC in their own half.
